entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
